Address: 3280 PEACHTREE ROAD N.W. SUITE 2300, ATLANTA, Georgia, 30305, United States of America
CompanyDescription: In this Annual Report on Form 10-K (this "Form 10-K" or this "Report") the terms "Company," "Cumulus," "CUMULUS MEDIA," "we," "us," and "our" refer to Cumulus Media Inc. and its consolidated subsidiaries. We use the term "local marketing agreement" ("LMA") in this Report. In a typical LMA, the licensee of a radio station makes available, for a fee and reimbursement of its expenses, airtime on its station to a party which supplies programming to be broadcast during that airtime, and collects revenues from advertising aired during such programming.  ...
